PieceMetaOSCPlayer

This early piece of beta magic allows local playback of the data as OSC packages.

Doesn't look too fancy, i know... BUT: It is available for Mac, Linux and Windows and a new version is already in the making.

Pro tip:You can scroll the data tracks by clicking and dragging.

Downloads

Download MAC version

If Mac OS refuses to open the app (it is not signed) just go to System Preferences > Security and click on "open anyway".

Download LINUX version

(64bit version only, two separate binaries for libglew1.6 and libglew1.10 included, if it fails to start, check ldd on the executable)

Download WIN version

(64bit version only)
